plurals.name: show_dev_countdown_cm
plurals.item: You are now %1$d step away from enabling development settings.
You are now %1$d steps away from enabling development settings.

resources.string: No need, you have already enabled development settings.
Default to MTP instead of Charging when connected to a PC
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for restarting into soft, recovery or bootloader
Allowing apps to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
View and control the root rules
Double-tap on the status bar or lockscreen to turn off the display
Perform various touchscreen gestures for quick actions
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Skip the swipe to unlock screen and immediately begin password entry
Skip the swipe to unlock screen and immediately begin pattern entry
Skip the swipe to unlock screen and immediately begin PIN entry
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Enable the Android Debug Bridge (ADB) interface
Display a notification when USB or network debugging is enabled
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi\u2011Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back button
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the %1$s of your phone.
SIM card will be deactivated. Do you want to continue?
This SIM will be disabled and SIM %1$s will be used for data services. Are you sure you want to continue?
Unable to perform the operation while airplane mode is on.
Unable to perform the operation while in call.
Are you sure you wish to reset counters?
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Sounds and vibrations of the dialer
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Display a warning at bottom of the QS panel while your network is monitored by external apps or a VPN
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Show a dialog to choose which USB mode to use when plugged into a computer
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Increase ringtone volume to maximum level when device is in pocket
Show the music track title as the QS tile title
Display priority notifications in a small floating window
Settings screen animation and scrolling cache
This is test for selected toast animation
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory

Ambient Music Ticker allows for the ability to show the current music track info on the lockscreen with or without Ambient display enabled.\nYou can select from two layouts, normal and minimal. While this feature takes advantage of ambient display, it does not depend on it.
Allow theme apps from unknown sources
Enable to show battery percent while dozing
Increase touchscreen sensitivity so it can be used while wearing gloves
Please make sure to disable every Font Overlay in Substratum before using this.\nIf you want to go back to using Substratum, make sure to select the Default Font (Roboto) here.
Customize screenshot attributes like delay, type
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Choose which app should be launched when tapping on the screenshot notification edit button
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
When enable, statusbar will be hidden on lockscreen. Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Change the clock widget\'s visibility.\nNote: the switch also affects the display in \"Cast\" and \"Ambient display\"
Change the date\'s visibility underneath the clock widget.\nNote: the switch also affects the display in \"Cast\" and \"Ambient display\"
Change the alarm text\'s visibility underneath the clock widget.\nNote: the switch also affects the display in \"Cast\" and \"Ambient display\"
Hide charging information and unlock hints
Change the lock screen icon visibility
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Control how the device network should behave when the screen is off
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Show low battery notification when enabled
Allow unlocking device using fingerprint when screen is off or dozing
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Show clear all button on recents panel
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Show a kill app button in notifaction shade
Allows you to hover the screen like a mouse in web browsers, remote desktops, etc
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Show heads up for dialer even if heads up is off to avoid fullscreen dialer on incoming calls
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Launch music app on headset connection
When BT headset (no carkit) is connected
When wired or BT headset (no carkit) is connected
When wired or BT headset is connected
Play the notification sound of each app only once per set time period
Notifications sound vibration if screen on
Vibrate instead of playing a sound for in-call notifications
Blink flashlight only in ringer mode
Blink flashlight only in DND mode
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery.
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Apply a tint to the background based on the homescreen wallpaper
Enable the tile running services icon in the footer
Enable the settings shortcut in the header
Enable the tile edit icon in the header
Enable the MultiUser switch in the header
Enable the expand indicator (^) in the header
Note: Most apps need to be restarted for custom values to take effect
Reset all animation settings to default?
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Display the number of pending notifications
From headset if connected and playing music
Display and customize battery bar near status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Press on color below to apply
Allow accessing quick settings and swipe shortcuts on secure lock screen
Allow accessing power menu on secure lock screen
Apply blur & rounded corner & tint personalizations to various elements
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the QS tiles and background
Blur the background of recent apps window
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view. Only translucent notifications are enabled.

These colors are the ones tiniting the BlurBackground. Instead of the normal Grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like.\nThere are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for Dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds.
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view. Only translucent notifications are enabled.
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Change the view of the recents screen
Clear background process when using dismiss icon to dismiss task from recents view. This may lead unitentional results. Some apps may stop working until you restart them.
Double-tap on the lockscreen to turn off the display
This will hide all force close notificaitons. Use with caution
Prevent apps from appearing in recents
Apps to not show when tapping on a Share button
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Configure service to enable weather details
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Display image and temp with scale
Display image and temp without scale
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app. Need for MicroG!
